Articles.Content: Hi, I'm trying to create a new project on curse, however after filling out all the fields (desc, title, etc), I click "Start Project," only for the page to start loading with a "Waiting for Kerbal.CurseForge.com." Several minutes later it takes me to curse error page saying that This Page cannot be shown. I have tried relogging in and different browsers. Anyone else having this problem?
Is your internet connection good? Are you uploading large files (pictures models et cetera)?

My internet is 100% fine, and the files being uploaded are a couple hundred kilobytes. My connection to the rest of Curseforge is also fine.

- - - Updated - - -

Ok, NOW it worked after about 10 minutes of loading and about 20 attempts.

My internet is 100% fine, and the files being uploaded are a couple hundred kilobytes. My connection to the rest of Curseforge is also fine.

- - - Updated - - -

Ok, NOW it worked after about 10 minutes of loading and about 20 attempts.

There might be an issue, or it may have been a short maintenance window. Is it still happening? Have you ever had it happen before?
